general_notes.the_graph_subgraph: Most DEX using The Graph Subgraph API have similar limits: ~1000 requests/hour per IP on free tier. Can be throttled if exceeded.
general_notes.recommendations: For production use, consider: 1) Using API keys where available for higher limits, 2) Implementing request throttling, 3) Caching responses, 4) Using WebSocket where available for real-time data
general_notes.warning: Rate limits may change. Always check official documentation before production deployment.
